title: Laptop Help
body:
Hello all,

I normally place LoL on my desktop, but as I have been travelling a lot for work I am planning on purchasing a laptop for myself. I generally just play Hearthstone when I'm away from home, but was wondering if this MSI laptop would be able to run LoL, I'm not looking to run everything on ultra high settings, just medium really. 

http://www.mwave.com.au/product/msi-gs60-2pc481au-gaming-laptop-156-core-i7-8gb-128gb-1tb-gtx860m-2gb-win81-ab58233

Thank you very much for all the help.

replies.body:
That sort of laptop looks like it'll have no problem for what you want. It's equivalent to a computer from a few years back.

Just make sure you don't overheat it.
